data.title: IZ*ONE Members Profile (Updated!)
data.meta_description: IZ*ONE (아이즈원) (アイズワン) was a Korean-Japanese girl group formed by MNET’s Produce48, the third season of Produce 101.
data.text:
IZ*ONE Members Profile: IZ*ONE Facts

IZ*ONE (아이즈원) (アイズワン) was a South Korean-Japanese girl group formed by MNET’s Produce48, the third season of Produce 101. Produce48 brought together Japanese trainees from AKB48 & their sister groups and Korean trainees from many different labels. The members consisted of Jang Wonyoung, Miyawaki Sakura, Jo Yuri, Choi Yena, Ahn Yujin, Yabuki Nako, Kwon Eunbi, Kang Hyewon, Honda Hitomi, Kim Chaewon, Kim Minjoo, and Lee Chaeyeon. The group was co-managed by Off The Record Entertainment in Korea and AKS (the company that manages AKB48) in Japan. IZ*ONE debuted in Korea on October 29th, 2018 and they debuted in Japan on February 6, 2019. IZ*ONE promoted for 2 years and 6 months. They officially disbanded on April 29th, 2021.

IZ*ONE Fandom Name: Wiz*one

IZ*ONE Official Color: –

IZ*ONE Dorm Arrangement (as of June 2020):

Dorm 1: Eunbi & Hyewon; Yena & Chaewon (roommates); Minju; Yujin (solo rooms)

Dorm 2: Yuri & Nako; Sakura & Chaeyeon (roommates); Hitomi; Wonyoung (solo rooms)

IZ*ONE Official Accounts:

Instagram: @official_izone

Twitter: @official_izone

Facebook: official.izone

Weibo: Official IZ*ONE

V Live: IZ*ONE

Fan Cafe: official-izone

Website: iz-one.co.kr

Youtube: Official IZ*ONE

Naver Post: 아이즈원

TikTok: @officializone_

IZ*ONE Members Profile:

Eunbi (Rank 7)

Stage Name: Eunbi (은비)

Birth Name: Kwon Eun Bi (권은비)

Position: Leader, Main Dancer, Lead Vocalist

Birthday: September 27, 1995

Zodiac Sign: Libra

Height: 159 cm (5’3”)

Weight: 46 kg (101 lbs)

Blood Type: A

MBTI Type: ENFP (210207 VLive)

Instagram: @silver_rain._ / @official_kwon.eunbi

Twitter: @kwoneunbi

TikTok: @official_kwoneunbi

Youtube: 권은비 – KWON EUN BI

vLive: KWON EUN BI

Eunbi Facts:

– She was born in Siheung-Dong, Geumcheon-Gu, Seoul, South Korea.

– She has an older brother who was born in 1993.

– She debuted in the group Ye-A in 2014 and left in November 2014, her stage name was “Kazoo.”

– Her official color is a shade of purple called Embroidered Starlight.

– She is the “mother” of IZ*ONE. (181024 XSportNews Interview) as if 2020,Eunbi said on NOW radio that Sakura is the Father Figure of their group while Chaeyeon is the Mother Figure.

– Eunbi has a knack for discovering dessert restaurants.

– Sometimes Eunbi has lisps of letter S

– She enjoys running and shopping.

– She can play the guitar.

– Eunbi is good at sports. (Idol Room)

– Eunbi’s favorite ice cream flavor is green tea chocolate.

– Eunbi said that Minjoo and her have similar tastes.

– Woollim trainees said that Eunbi is like their mother cause of her good leadership skills.

– Eunbi worked as a part timer in a Paris Baguette franchise.

– She was part of a dance group called PLAY.

– She was a back dancer for Lovelyz.

– She’s known for looking like Irene from Red Velvet.

– Her specialties are dancing, impersonations, and POP Art.

– EunBi and Cherry Bullet‘s HaeYoon are close, they share friendship rings.

– Eunbi was featured in Dongwoo from Infinite’s “Embedded in Mind” solo live performance in Infinite That Summer 3.

– Eunbi really admires IU.

– Company: Woollim Entertainment

– She debuted solo on August 24, 2021 with the EP “Open”.

Show more Eunbi fun facts…

Sakura (Rank 2)

Stage Name: Sakura (咲良) (さくら) (사쿠라)

Birth Name: Miyawaki Sakura (宮脇 咲良) (みやわき さくら) (미야와키 사쿠라)

Position: Sub Vocalist, Sub Rapper, Visual

Birthday: March 19, 1998

Zodiac Sign: Pisces

Height: 163 cm (5’4”)

Weight: 43 kg (94 lbs)

Blood Type: A

MBTI Type: INFP (201103 Hi-touch)

Instagram: @39saku_chan

Twitter: @39saku_chan

Youtube: Sakura’s gaming channel / Sakura Miyawaki

7Gogo: miyawaki-sakura

Weibo: Sakura

TikTok: @39saku_chan.88

Sakura Facts:

– Sakura was born in Kagoshima City, Japan.

– Sakura has a younger brother.

– She attended Shigakukan Middle School, a private school in Kisarazu, Japan.

– Sakura’s official color is a shade of pink called Cherry Blossom Pink.

– Sakura trained for 6 years and 11 months.

– Sakura has debuted in 2011 as part of the first generation of HKT48.

– She had a concurrent position in AKB48’s Team A from February 2014 to December 2017.

– She was chosen before as center for AKB48.

– She was under HKT48, she was the sub-captain of HKT48 team KIV.

– She graduated from HKT48 on June 19, 2021.

– Her charm point is her larger ears.

– Her hobbies include playing video games, reading, watching movies, and acting. She was a child actress and aspires to become an actress again.

– Sakura received a Nintendo Switch and a PS4 from fans during IZ*ONE’s fansigns.

– Her favourite drink is green tea latte.

– Sakura’s favorite Japanese food is sushi.

– Sakura doesn’t really like anko (red bean paste).

– Her special talent is drawing funny pictures.

– Sakura sleeps with eyes open. (IZ*ONE Chu)

– Sakura is able to guess people’s blood type just by looking at them.

– Sakura is a Reveluv (Red Velvet fan) and her bias is Irene.

– Her special skills are being able to sleep anywhere and drawing.

– She was a member of theater appreciation and drama club in school.

– A few of her other members say she has a very weird way of running.

– She is also part of Kami7 (the term Kami7 describes the 7 most popular members among all 48-groups: AKB48, SKE48, NMB48, HKT48, NGT48 and STU48)

– Sakura was given a lead role in AKB48’s drama “Majisuka Gakuen 4” (2015).

– Sakura acted as “Maki” in the Japanese horror miniseries drama “Crow’s Blood” (2016).

– Sakura was always in the upper ranks of Produce48 and was P48’s first center.

– Sakura is the Father of IZ*ONE (Stated by Eunbi on NOW Radio)

– On December 8, 2021 Sakura launched her own cosmetic brand, CRAN BY MOLAK.

– Company (while on Produce48): EMI Records (HKT48)

– On March 14, 2022, it was announced that she signed a contract with Source Music.

– Along with Chaewon, she is currently a member of Source Music’s girl group LE SSERAFIM.

Show more Sakura fun facts…

Hyewon (Rank 8)

Stage Name: Hyewon (혜원)

Birth Name: Kang Hye Won (강혜원)

Position: Lead Rapper, Sub Vocalist, Visual

Birthday: July 5, 1999

Zodiac Sign: Cancer

Height: 163 cm (5’4”)

Weight: 43 kg (95 lbs)

Blood Type: B

MBTI Type: ESFP/ISFP (200628 Fansign)

Instagram: @hyemhyemu

Twitter: @hyemu_official

Youtube: 강혜원

Hyewon Facts:

– She was born in Yangsan, South Gyeongsang, South Korea.

– She has a younger brother who was born in 2002.

– She attended Bokwang High School in Yangsan, then she transferred to Hanlim Multi Art School.

– Hyewon’s nickname is Innocent Rapper.

– Hyewon’s official color is Kang Coral.

– Her hobby is watching animations and dramas.

– She can play the piano and guitar.

– Hyewon likes anime and takoyaki.

– Hyewon can eat a small cup of noodles in 3 bites. (Qt Show)

– She has a dog named Zeze.

– Hyewon’s favorite ice cream flavor is vanilla.

– She’s a former Music K Entertainment trainee.

– She’s a former HYWY Entertainment trainee.

– Hyewon known for her pure and innocent looks.

– Hyewon and Yena attended the same school, but they never met each other for 3 years. (IZ*One Chu ep.1)

– Yujin said that recently Hyewon and Yena are getting very well with each other. (vLive)

– Hyewon almost debuted in DAYDAY (debut was cancelled).

– Her Produce 48 motto was “Radiating quirky energy”.

– Prior to debuting with IZ*ONE, she trained for 9 months.

– Company: 8D Creative

Show more Hyewon fun facts…

Yena (Rank 4)

Stage Name: Yena (예나)

Birth Name: Choi Ye Na (최예나)

Position: Main Rapper, Lead Vocalist, Lead Dancer

Birthday: September 29, 1999

Zodiac Sign: Libra

Height: 162 cm (5’3”)

Weight: 45 kg (99 lbs)

Blood Type: A

MBTI Type: ENFP (Girl’s High School Mystery Club EP 0 Preview)

Instagram: @yena.jigumina

Twitter: @yena_official

Yena Facts:

– She was born in Gil-Dong, Gangdong, South Korea.

– Yena has an older brother: actor and former SPEED member Choi Sungmin.

– She attended Hanlim Multi Art School.

– Yena attended Joy Dance Academy and majored in girls hip-hop dance.

– She trained for 3 years and 5 months.

– Her official color is Yen-low.

– Her talent is playing claw machines and playing games in general.

– Her hobby is reading comic books and watching movies alone.

– Her lips are her secret weapon.

– She had the role of “Sweet Eonni” on the show “Cooking Class”.

– Yena’s favorite ice cream is flavor strawberry and chocolate.

– Well known for being very bright and energetic. Also very affectionate with the other trainees. Though when she gets on stage her aura changes to very powerful and captivating.

– She is the happy virus of the group

– Yena was crowned as “Personal Talent One Queen” in Weekly Idol.

– Yena has a dog named Audrey. (IZ*ONE CHU ep.4)

– Yena and Hyewon used to attend the same school.

– Yujin said that recently Yena and Hyewon are getting very well with each other. (vLive)

– Yena is a big fan of Bora (ex Sistar).

– Yena is a childhood cancer survivor, she had lymphoma & was told there was no chance of survival but miraculously recovered. Her family wasn’t well-off so her parents had to sell kimbap every morning to be able to pay her hospital bills.

– She is a former Polaris Ent trainee, and she is friends with LOONA`s Heejin and Hyunjin and DIA’s Jueun from their trainee period.

– Company: YUEHUA Entertainment

– She debuted as a soloist on January 17, 2022 with the mini-album “ˣ‿ˣ (SMiLEY)”.

Show more Yena fun facts…

Chaeyeon (Rank 12)

Stage Name: Chaeyeon (채연)

Birth Name: Lee Chae Yeon (이채연)

Position: Main Dancer, Lead Vocalist, Lead Rapper

Birthday: January 11, 2000

Zodiac Sign: Capricorn

Height: 165.2 cm (5’5″)

Weight: 47 kg (104 lbs)

Blood Type: A

MBTI Type: ENFJ-T (190917 Private mail)

Instagram: @chaestival_

Twitter: @official_lcy

Chaeyeon Facts:

– Her hometown is Yongin, South Korea.

– Her official color is a shade of green called Chaenmerald.

– She is the “father” of IZ*ONE. (181024 XSportNews Interview) as if 2020, Eunbi stated Chaeyeon is the Mother of IZ*ONE (On NOW Radio)

– She trained for 4 years and 1 month.

– She is a former JYP Ent. trainee.

– She appeared in the show “SIXTEEN”, the show that created TWICE, but sadly was eliminated first.

– Chaeyeon has 2 younger sisters: Lee Chaeryeong (1,5 year younger than her), and Chaemin (6 years younger than her).

– On “SIXTEEN” she was known as a “fashion holic.”

– Chaeyeon and Chaeryoung auditioned for Fantagio in 2012.

– Chaeyeon was a contestant of KPOP Star season 3 along with her sister, Chaeryeong.

– Chaeyeon’s sister Chaeryeong, is a member of JYP’s new girl group ITZY.

– She was a part of KYW Dance School and uploaded some dance covers.

– She likes playing badminton and cooking in her spare time.

– Chaeyeon is extremely good at girl’s hip hop.

– Chaeyeon’s habit is hiding her forehead.

– Chaeyeon used to wear braces.

– She has a dog named Chaeri.

– She can speak Japanese.

– She likes spicy food.

– Chaeyeon’s favorite ice cream flavor is yogurt.

– The members said that Chaeyeon is good at cooking.

– In IZ*ONE Chaeyeon is closest to Sakura.

– If she were a boy, out of the IZ*ONE members she’d date Sakura. (Iz*one Chu ep 2)

– Chaeyeon had a cameo in Bread, Love and Dreams when she was young (Fancafe)

– Motto: “Whatever it is, unless you’re crazy, you can achieve it”.

– Company: WM Entertainment

– She debuted as a soloist on October 12, 2022 with the mini album HUSH RUSH.

Show more Chaeyeon fun facts…

Chaewon (Rank 10)

Stage Name: Chaewon (채원)

Birth Name: Kim Chae Won (김채원)

Position: Lead Vocalist, Lead Dancer

Birthday: August 1, 2000

Zodiac Sign: Leo

Height: 163.9 cm (5’4″)

Weight: 42 kg (92 lbs)

Blood Type: B

MBTI Type: ISFP (IZ*ONE fandom)

Instagram: @_chaechae_1

Chaewon Facts:

– She is the daughter of theater actress Lee Ran Hee.

– Chaewon has an older sister who was born in 1994.

– Chaewon attends Hanlim Multi Art School.

– She trained for 11 months.

– Her nickname is “Angel Chaewon”, “Fairy Chaewon”, “Raddish Cabbage Fairy”

– Her official color is a shade of green called Chaemmu.

– She enjoys watching movies and choreography videos, listening to ballads, and eating.

– Many fans think Chaewon looks like the female version of Stray Kids’s Felix.

– Singing and dancing are her specialties.

– Her talent is eating spicy food.

– Chaewon really loves mandarins.

– She can peel 3 tangerines in 30 seconds. (Qt Show)

– Chaewon’s favorite ice cream flavor is mint chocolate.

– Chaewon appeared in 2012 KBS Korean Children’s Song Contest.

– She appeared in Golden Child’s “Let Me” MV.

– Chaewon was featured on Mamamoo’s Moonbyul song “Selfish” during Mama 2018 in Japan.

– Chaewon really admires Taeyeon.

– Company (while on Produce 48): Woollim Entertainment

– In 2021, Chaewon left Woollim Entertainment to join Source Music.

– Along with Sakura, she re-debuted as a member of the girl group LE SSERAFIM on May 2, 2022, with the mini album Fearless.

Show more Chaewon fun facts…

Minju (Rank 11)

Stage Name: Minju (민주)

Birth Name: Kim Min Ju (김민주)

Position: Lead Rapper, Sub Vocalist, Visual

Birthday: February 5, 2001

Zodiac Sign: Aquarius

Height: 163.8 cm (5’4″)

Weight: 45 kg (99lbs)

Blood Type: AB

MBTI Type: INFJ (Hello Vogue)

Instagram: @minn.__.ju

Twitter: @minju_official_

Minju Facts:

– Her official color is a shade of white called Snow White Minju.

– Minju has a younger sister and an older brother.

– She was a child actress for “The Great Seducer”.

– Her nicknames are “Minmin” (given by Kriesha Chu) and “Pepe” (green frog in Korean).

– She attends SOPA (Seoul School of Performing Arts).

– She enjoys walking, photography, and watching sitcoms.

– She is a Harry Potter fan. (vLive with Kriesha Chu)

– She also likes rollercosters and amusement park rides. (vLive with Kriesha Chu)

– When she was in middle school she wanted to become a stewardess.

– Her specialties are playing the guitar and imitating faces (mostly animals).

– Minju is good at speaking English. (Kriesha Chu’s vlive )

– Minju loves gummy bears. (Kriesha Chu’s vlive )

– She is good at cooking. (Kriesha Chu’s vlive )

– Minju’s favorite ice cream flavor is chocolate.

– Lacked confidence in the beginning of Produce48 and was scolded for it often. Around mid-season she gained what she didn’t have any many people were blown away.

– Minju is the best friend of the soloist Kriehsa Chu.

– She was featured in Kriesha Chu’s “Like Paradise” MV and iKon‘s “#WYD” MV.

– She was featured in Kriesha Chu’s song “Falling Star”.

– Minju appeared in a web drama called “Immortal Goddess”.

– She acted in a movie called “The Fault Is Not Yours”, as a supporting role.

– Minju made a cameo in ATEEN season 2.

– Company (While on Produce 48): Urban Works

– She is currently still an actress under Management SOOP.

Show more Minju fun facts…

Nako (Rank 6)

Stage Name: Nako (奈子) (なこ) (나코)

Birth Name: Yabuki Nako (矢吹奈子) (やぶき なこ) (야부키 나코)

Position: Sub Vocalist

Birthday: June 18, 2001

Zodiac Sign: Gemini

Height: 150 cm (4’11”)

Weight: 40 kg (88 lbs)

Blood Type: N/A

MBTI Type: ISFJ-T (200315 Private mail)

Instagram: @75_yabuki

Twitter: @nako_yabuki_75

7Gogo: @yabuki-nako

TikTok: @nako_75_

Nako Facts:

– Nako was born in Tokyo prefecture, Japan.

– Immediate family consists of mother, younger, and elder sister.

– Nako is under HKT48.

– Her official color is a shade of blue called Nabuki Sky.

– She trained for 4 years and 10 months.

– Her charm point is her dimples in which she “gets from her mama.”

– Nako can do ballet.

– She enjoys watching movies by herself, karaoke, playing cards, eating ice, and “stretching out her short neck.”

– Nako likes to play card games specially daifugou. (stage48.net)

– Her favourite candy is Choco Pie.

– Her favourite food is caramel pudding.

– Nako loves ice cream.

– Nako’s skill is to braid her hair fast.

– Debuted in HKT48 in 2013 with the 3rd Generation.

– Became the center of Wink wa Sankai within a month of debuting in HKT48.

– Was known as the ace of the 3rd Generation.

– Nako had a concurrent position in AKB48’s Team B from March 2015 to December 2017.

– Was the second youngest member to get a concurrent position at 13 years, 9 months, and 9 days.

– A “Love Berry” exclusive model.

– Revealed that she appeared in a commercial for Koala March crackers before joining HKT48.

– Appeared in “Love Stories from Fukuoka 10” and “Majisuka Gakuen” in 2015 as supporting roles.

– She is afraid of heights.

– Nako is the best at Korean in the Japanese line.

– Was the shortest trainee on Produce48.

– Nako was known as the girl who ranked from F to A.

– Nako said that if she was a boy, she would date Yena because she’s charming.

– Nako is a fan of Twice and especially Jihyo.

– Believes she was a cat in her previous life.

– Company: EMI Records (HKT48)

Show more Nako fun facts…

Hitomi (Rank 9)

Stage Name: Hitomi (仁美) (ひとみ) (히토미)

Birth Name: Honda Hitomi (本田仁美) (ほんだ ひとみ) (혼다 히토미)

Position: Lead Dancer, Sub Vocalist, Sub Rapper

Birthday: October 6, 2001

Zodiac Sign: Libra

Height: 159.2 cm (5’2”)

Weight: 44.4 kg (98 lbs)

Blood Type: A

Instagram: @10_hitomi_06

Twitter: @hnd_htm__1006

7Gogo: @honda-hitomi

TikTok: @hondahitomi_1006

Hitomi Facts:

– Hitomi is from Tochigi prefecture, Japan.

– Hitomi has an older sister named Erii and an older brother. (IZ*ONE Chu ep.2)

– Hitomi’s nicknames are Strawberry Princess, Hyi-Chan and Pang Hitomi (which means Bread Hitomi).

– Hitomi is in AKB48’s Team B.

– Honda Hitomi was also in the AKB48 Team 8.

– She graduated from AKB48 Team 8 on January 26, 2024, at the AKB48’s concert held at Pacifico Yokohama Hall in Kanagawa.

– She is under AKS and Toyota.

– Her official color is Tomi Beige.

– She trained for 4 years and 2 months.

– Debuted in AKB48 in 2014 (in Team 8).

– Her favorite foods are strawberries and gyoza.

– Hitomi’s favorite Korean dish is stirred fried chicken, she likes how the cheese is melted.

– Her special skill is basketball.

– In elementary school she was a cheerleader for 4 years and can do backflips and preform complex routines.

– She enjoys watching cooking videos in her spare time.

– She is good at composing songs.

– She is very competitive.

– Hitomi said that if she was a boy, she would date Yena because she’s funny.

– One of her quotes is “I will so hard to overstep my limit.”

– Company: Kings Records (AKB48)

Show more Hitomi fun facts…

Yuri (Rank 3)

Stage Name: Yuri (유리)

Birth Name: Jo Yu Ri (조유리)

Position: Main Vocalist

Birthday: October 22, 2001

Zodiac Sign: Libra

Height: 163 cm (5’4″)

Weight: 45 kg (99 lbs)

Blood Type: AB

MBTI Type: INFJ (IZ*ONE fandom)

Twitter: @JOYURI_offcl

Instagram: @zo__glasss / @joyuri_offcl

Facebook: JOYURI.offcl

Youtube: 조유리 JO YURI

Yuri Facts:

– She is from Busan, South Korea.

– She has a younger sister who was born in 2005.

– Her official color is Yul-range.

– She trained for 9 months.

– She enjoys singing, playing the guitar, keyboard, and drums.

– Yuri knows how to play the piano, but she ended up giving up on that, because of financial issues. (She said it on Idol School)

– Her specialty is her husky voice which she’s she became known for on Produce48.

– Playing the keyboard and drums are also her other specialties.

– Yuri thinks her lips are her charm point. (“Idol School”)

– Yuri hates bugs.

– Yuri’s favorite ice cream is flavor cotton candy.

– She’s also known for looking shockingly similar to former IOI and current Weki Meki member Choi Yoojung.

– Yuri was an Idol School contestant.

– As a former contestant of Idol School, Yuri is close to all the members of Fromis_9.

– Company (while a contestant of Produce 48): Stone Music Entertainment

– In May 2021, it was announced that she signed with WAKEONE.

– She made her official solo debut on October 7, 2021 with the single “GLASSY”.

Show more Yuri fun facts…

Yujin (Rank 5)

Stage Name: Yujin (유진)

Birth Name: Ahn Yu Jin (안유진)

Position: Lead Vocalist, Lead Dancer

Birthday: September 1, 2003

Zodiac Sign: Virgo

Height: 173 cm (5’8”)

Weight: 48 kg (106 lbs)

Blood Type: A

MBTI Type: ISTP (IVE interviews)

Instagram: @_yujin_an

Yujin Facts:

– She was born in Dunsan-dong, Seo-gu, Daejeon, S. Korea.

– She has an older sister who was born in 1999.

– Yujin is close to Jiheon from fromis_9 because they are from the same agency and are the same age.

– Her official color is Bluejinnie.

– She trained for 1 year and 4 months.

– Her specialties are girl’s hip hop and piano.

– She enjoys shopping around in Gangnam.

– Yujin is the “vitamin” of IZ*ONE. (Fansign Nov 3, 2018)

– Yujin is good at sports. (Idol Room)

– Yujin’s favorite ice cream flavor is green tea.

– Hitomi’s dad is Yujin’s fan. (Iz*one Chu Ep2)

– She appeared in MVs: Soyou X Baekyun‘s “Rain” MV, Jeong Sewoon‘s “Just U” MV, Ailee X Mad Clown’s “Thirst” MV and Yoo Seungwoo X Sandeul’s “Oppa” MV.

– Before appearing on Produce48, Yujin was already a well known face from her appearance in a CF.

– Yujin was a participant on ‘king of The Masked Singer’ as ‘Icycle’.

– She is the youngest participant on “King of Mask Singer” at 15 years and 104 days old to date.

– Yujin appeared in “Idol Room” as Special MC in ep. 31.

– Company: Starship Entertainment

– Yujin is currently a member of the girl group IVE, alongside Wonyoung.

Show more Yujin fun facts…

Wonyoung (Rank 1)

Stage Name: Wonyoung (원영)

Birth Name: Jang Won Young (장원영)

Position: Lead Dancer, Sub Vocalist, Sub Rapper, Center, Maknae

Birthday: August 31, 2004

Zodiac Sign: Virgo

Height: 173 cm (5’8″)

Weight: 47 kg (104 lbs)

Blood Type: O

MBTI Type: E… (She’s not sure, but she said her MBTI starts with E – IVE interviews)

Instagram: @for_everyoung10

Wonyoung Facts:

– She was born in Seoul, S. Korea.

– She has an older sister who was born in 2001.

– She trained for 1 year and 2 months.

– Wonyoung’s official color is a shade of pink called Candy Pink 10.

– She enjoys playing with her sister she when she’s home.

– She was one of the youngest trainees on Produce48.

– Wonyoung’s father is a music teacher and asked his students to support his daughter on the show.

– Wonyoung used to wear braces.

– Wonyoung’s nicknames are “Born to be Center” “Giant Baby” and “Giant Maknae”

– During Produce 48, some netizens thought that Wonyoung and fromis_9‘s Gyuri looked alike.

– She likes spicy food.

– Wonyoung’s favorite ice flavor cream is mint chocolate.

– Her specialty is girl’s hip hop.

– She speaks English.

– Her special talent is her English pronunciation.

– Wonyoung can wink 63 times in 30 seconds. (Qt Show)

– She appears in YDPP’s MV.

– On the show, the other trainees commonly complimented her body ratios, her legs are rather long.

– She was declared as the center/rank 1 of the group on her 14th birthday.

– Wonyoung is ranked 88th on TC Candler “The 100 Most Beautiful Faces of 2018”.

– Company: Starship Entertainment

– Wonyoung is currently a member of the girl group IVE, alongside Yujin.

Show more Wonyoung fun facts…

Note: Please don’t copy-paste the content of this page to other sites/places on the web. If you use info from our profile, please kindly put a link to this post. Thanks a lot! 🙂 – Kprofiles.com

Post by rosesbreakeven
